name: MeliModa
overview:
MeliModa is a fashion, social commerce network servicing the wholesale and retail industry. Designers on MeliModa can upload their collection enabling boutique buyers to browse and buy efficiently saving time and money.

MeliModa was created with the purpose to help designers spread brand awareness and to streamline the buying process amongst the fashion industry.

Consumers are welcomed onto MeliModa where they can view upcoming designer collections, pre-order, and vote on their favorite pieces. This gives both the brand and boutique buyer early statistical data of which items are most popular.
